attributes.action: Have a referendum not a General Election
attributes.additional_details: People will be asked to decide if they want Boris' Conservative party (Brexit at any cost) or remain or only leave with a deal across other parties. This means people who are stanuchly against austerity but for BREXIT will be forced to vote for Conservative MPs. Or those who are stanuchly against a labour government but also against Brexit will have to vote to get in a government they don't want. To see the kind of Brexit the people want hold a referendum asking that question not a GE!
attributes.background: A general election to "Choose who goes to Brussels on the 17th to sort this out" ultimately means a General Election purely about Brexit. A proxy referendum with consequences about domestic policy that will be overshadowed by the issue of Brexit.
